statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_cost ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_cost, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, maintenance_cost ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE 'Oil%' AND maintenance_cost > 100 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation' ORDER BY maintenance_cost ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING SUM(maintenance_cost) > 5000
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(vehicle_id)) AS num_vehicles, AVG(maintenance_cost) AS avg_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 200
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, scheduled_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE next_maintenance_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_maintenance_date >= '2022-09-01'
SELECT maintenance_description, scheduled_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY scheduled_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-10-01' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE current_location LIKE '%California%'

SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE next_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL AND last_maintenance_date < next_maintenance_date ORDER BY next_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_schedule FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_duration > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT vehicle_name, task_description FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_tasks ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_tasks.vehicle_id;
SELECT technician_name, technician_level FROM technicians ORDER BY technician_level DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_schedule FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT task_description, task_duration FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY task_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_tasks ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_tasks.vehicle_id WHERE vehicles.vehicle_name = 'Car' AND maintenance_tasks.task_duration > '2 days';
SELECT technician_name, technician_level FROM technicians WHERE technician_level = 'Senior' ORDER BY technician_name ASC;

SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_schedule, task_description FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_tasks ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_tasks.vehicle_id WHERE maintenance_tasks.task_duration < '3 days' ORDER BY vehicle_name, maintenance_schedule ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, model FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_id, technician_name FROM Technicians;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_type, technician FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT technician_id, technician_name, technician_contact FROM Technicians WHERE technician_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY technician_contact;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT part_name, part_number, part_price FROM Parts WHERE part_price < 50.00;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, cost FROM Maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_number, part_price FROM Parts WHERE part_price > 100;
SELECT make, model, year, cost FROM Vehicle INNER JOIN Maintenance ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = Maintenance.vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_date;
